column1: in memory of warren e hall -- weldon funeral home| first: last: born: april 27
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:weldon funeral home. penn yan
column6: 2015 send card. warren e. hall 66 of keuka park passed away on monday june 15
column7: 2015 peacefully at home surrounded by family and friends. calling hours will be held on monday june 22nd from 2-4 and 6-8 with funeral services to be held on tuesday june 23rd at 11 am. memorial donations may be made to the american cancer society.
